name: LayerComp
shortdesc: A snapshot of a state of the layers in a document &#40;can be used to view different page layouts or compostions).

property.name: typename
property.shortdesc: The class name of the object.

property.name: name
property.shortdesc: The name of the layer comp.

property.name: comment
property.shortdesc: The description of the layer comp.

property.name: appearance
property.shortdesc: If true, uses layer appearance (layer styles) settings.

property.name: visibility
property.shortdesc: If true, the layer comp is visible.

property.name: selected
property.shortdesc: If true, the layer comp is currently selected.

method.name: apply
method.shortdesc: Applies the layer comp to the document.

method.name: recapture
method.shortdesc: Recaptures the current layer state(s) for this layer comp.

method.name: resetFromComp
method.shortdesc: Resets the layer comp state to the document state.
